widget.title: Tutorial - App Anatomy
widget.description:
This app demonstrates how to use client-side packages to customise application behavior and appearance. It is also the application that is used in the "App Anatomy" help document - http://docs.feedhenry.com/wiki/App_Anatomy
This app is also on github: https://github.com/feedhenry/App-Anatomy Doc: http://docs.feedhenry.com/wiki/App_Anatomy
